item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 17, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. CSS Gets a New Logo: and It Uses the Color `Rebeccapurple` (63 points | 5 comments)
2. James Gleick's Chaos: The Software (81 points | 8 comments)
3. Effect of a giant meteorite impact on Paleoarchean environment and life (95 points | 38 comments)
4. Teach Yourself to Echolocate (87 points | 22 comments)
5. The Bluesky firehose viewed in the style of a Windows XP screensaver (131 points | 48 comments)
6. Safety in an Unsafe World (30 points | discuss)
7. SICP: The only computer science book worth reading twice? (2010) (266 points | 111 comments)
8. Two galaxies aligned in a way where their gravity acts as a compound lens (200 points | 59 comments)
9. James Webb Space Telescope finds evidence for alternate theory of gravity (251 points | 108 comments)
10. Show HN: I built a(nother) house optimized for LAN parties (503 points | 204 comments)
11. Xogot – Godot for iPad (23 points | 7 comments)
12. Logica – Declarative logic programming language for data (108 points | 37 comments)
13. SmoothLLM: Defending Large Language Models Against Jailbreaking Attacks (28 points | 7 comments)
14. Two Nobel Prize winners want to cancel their own CRISPR patents in Europe (33 points | 3 comments)
15. Samurai Serial Killers and Mass Murderers (7 points | discuss)

19. JavaScript dos and donts Mu-An Chiou (28 points | 10 comments)
20. Pentagon fails 7th audit in a row but says progress made (61 points | 31 comments)
21. I tried every top email marketing tool (135 points | 76 comments)
22. Numpyro: Probabilistic programming with NumPy powered by Jax (80 points | 17 comments)
23. IPv6 networks do apparently get probed (29 points | 2 comments)
24. Optimizers: The Low-Key MVP (88 points | 6 comments)
25. Stop making me memorize the borrow checker (124 points | 102 comments)
26. Don't Look Twice: Faster Video Transformers with Run-Length Tokenization (51 points | 9 comments)
27. One-parting some Commodore 64 utilities for fun and profit (4 points | discuss)
28. Resolving a mysterious problem with find (6 points | 5 comments)
29. New haptic patch transmits complexity of touch to the skin (35 points | 5 comments)
30. The Difference Between a Standard DIMM and a Cudimm or Csodimm (31 points | 7 comments)
